response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which is not only unique but also highly valuable, has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. With its worth estimated at $1,000,000 to you, it promises to be an asset that will significantly enhance your endeavors. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a price of $950,000, aiming to provide you with a compelling value proposition while ensuring a fair return for our investment. Please consider this offer carefully and let me know if you would like to proceed with the acquisition.", "product_price": 950000}
